name: Batteryeet
description:
One battery. One tower to defend. One really determined guy.

Wield your gravity manipulating powers to grab and toss a battery crystal and slot it into weapons to defend the core from incoming ghosts. Survive all 9 waves with the highest score you can!

Control:
WASD - Movement
Left Click - Yeet Battery
Right Click - Pull Battery

Team :
Guntler - @donlawride
Gavin - @gavinandpiano
